original_title: 羞恥！青少年男女混合全裸体力測定
overview: There was a request from a medical college to measure physical fitness, and about 10 men and women were gathered from my school.  At first, I was proud that I was the representative of the school, but when the examination started, it wasn't the case ...  with embarrassing content that seemed to catch fire from my face ... I still remember that my body was burning. come.  Records and videos should still remain as research materials.
title: Shame! Youth Mixed Gender Nude Physical Fitness Test
